sentences.en: cranked up a massive publicity campaign.
sentences.cn: 开始了一次大规模的宣传运动

sentences.en: cranks out memo after memo.
sentences.cn: 迅速地摘记

sentences.en: cranks up the sound on the stereo.
sentences.cn: 使立体声的声音增强

sentences.en: He looked like a crank.
sentences.cn: 他看上去像个怪人。

sentences.en: He was called a crank at first.
sentences.cn: 一开始他被叫做思想怪异者.

sentences.en: He was idly turning a crank on a strange mechanism strapped to his chest.
sentences.cn: 他漫不经心地转着绑在他胸前的一个古怪装置上面的曲柄。

sentences.en: He's a crank, and a noxious crank. He calls himself an idealist.
sentences.cn: 他是个怪人, 而且还是个极为有害的怪人, 他自称是理想主义者.

sentences.en: I get the credit for being a terrible old crank.
sentences.cn: 我背上了老古怪的坏名声.

sentences.en: Just crank up your hearing aid a peg or two.
sentences.cn: 把助听器调高一两个刻度就可以。

sentences.en: My car's so old that I have to crank it up on cold mornings.
sentences.cn: 我的轿车旧了,不得不在寒冷的早晨用摇把发动.

sentences.en: My car's so old that I have to crank it.
sentences.cn: 我的车太旧了,我只好转动曲柄来发动它.

sentences.en: Oh, I'm a crank. But I do like to see things moving.
sentences.cn: 哦, 我 想 我这个人脾气挺古怪的, 但是我喜欢看到这里的一切事情都有所进步.

sentences.en: Predictors have been constructed by modifying the Crank - Nicolson equation.
sentences.cn: 预测式是利用修改克兰克-尼科尔森方程为构成的.

sentences.en: The chauffeur got out to crank the motor.
sentences.cn: 司机下车用曲柄去发动汽车。

sentences.en: The corrector is a modification of the Crank - Nicolson equation.
sentences.cn: 校正式是克兰克 -尼科尔森 方程的修改式.

sentences.en: The pedals of a cycle are attached to a crank.
sentences.cn: 自行车的踏板与曲柄相连.

sentences.en: The Prime Minister called Councillor Marshall "a crank"
sentences.cn: 首相称马歇尔议员为“怪人”。

sentences.en: The propeller will windmill and crank the engine.
sentences.cn: 螺旋浆将旋转并转动引擎的曲柄.

sentences.en: They crank out cars faster than they can sell them.
sentences.cn: 他们制造汽车很快,而销售跟不上.

sentences.en: Try cranking the engine.
sentences.cn: 试试用曲轴发动引擎。

phrases.tran_cn: 曲柄机构，曲轴齿轮；曲柄转动装置
使增大，使增强：在体积或强度上使…增强

trans.tran_cn: 脾气暴燥的, 易怒的
[机]曲柄，妙语，奇想，〈美俚〉想法古怪的人，〈口〉脾气乖戾的人
trans.tran_en: a handle on a piece of equipment, that you can turn in order to move something
to make something move by turning a crank

trans.tran_cn: 转动曲柄移动，使弯曲，给…装上用于转动的曲柄，转动曲柄开动（引擎）
trans.tran_en: to make something move by turning a crank
